verses.name: Isaiah 22:12
verses.text: And in that day did the Lord God of hosts call to weeping, and to mourning, and to baldness, and to girding with sackcloth:

verses.name: Isaiah 22:13
verses.text: And behold joy and gladness, slaying oxen, and killing sheep, eating flesh, and drinking wine: let us eat and drink; for to morrow we shall die.

verses.name: Isaiah 22:14
verses.text: And it was revealed in mine ears by the Lord of hosts, Surely this iniquity shall not be purged from you till ye die, saith the Lord God of hosts.
